description: ($A976)Set cursor graphic to the arrow. | ($FF74)Wait for VBlank interrupt. | Is this the second to bottom row?

name: WindowStartRow
label: WindowStartRow
description: INC $0003(PPUEntryCount)Update buffer entry count. | Save A. Always 0.

name: WindowStorePPUDatEnd
label: WindowStorePPUDatEnd
description: Store window tile byte in the PPU buffer.

name: WindowStorePlyrName
label: WindowStorePlyrName
description: ($AEB2)Set carry if max length name has been reached. | Has player finished entering name? If so, branch to exit loop. | ($A8E0)Wait for player to select the next character.

name: WindowTempToLineBuf
label: WindowTempToLineBuf
description: ($A753)Convert binary word to BCD. | ($A764)Remove leading zeros from BCD value. | Get last unprocessed entry in temp buffer.

name: WindowType1Table
label: WindowType1Table
description: Restore window type byte in A and return. | Command window, non-combat.

name: WindowUndrscrYPos
label: WindowUndrscrYPos
description: Branch always. | Prepare to erase underscore character. | Set Y position for underscore character.

name: WindowUnusedFunc1
label: WindowUnusedFunc1
description: This function appears to not be used.  It is not directly called through any other function | or the IRQ interrupt. | Pull the value off the stack.

name: WindowUnusedFunc2
label: WindowUnusedFunc2
description: Command windows columns. | Alphabet window columns. | Unused window function.

name: WindowUpPressed
label: WindowUpPressed
description: Store abort indicator in the selection results. | Disable up button retrigger.

name: WindowUpdateCrsrPos
label: WindowUpdateCrsrPos
description: Replace cursor with a blank tile. | ($A978)Set cursor tile to blank tile. | Set cursor to arrow tile for 10 frames.

name: WindowUpdateName
label: WindowUpdateName
description: ($AEB8)Show underscore below selected letter in name window. | End character processing. | Save name character on stack.

name: WindowUpdateTiles
label: WindowUpdateTiles
description: screen coord to nametable coords. | Indicate background tiles need to be updated.

name: WindowUpdateWrkTile
label: WindowUpdateWrkTile
description: Assume working tile will be a blank tile.

name: WindowUpperCaseConvert
label: WindowUpperCaseConvert
description: Player must have selected END. | Set name index to max value to indicate the end. | Add value to convert to nametable character.

name: WindowUpperLeftCorner
label: WindowUpperLeftCorner
description: In top row.  In left most column? | If so, branch to load lower left corner tile. | Border pattern - left border.

name: WindowUpperRightCorner
label: WindowUpperRightCorner
description: If so, branch to load lower right corner tile. | Border pattern - right border. | Done. Branch to update working tile and exit.

name: WindowVariableHeight
label: WindowVariableHeight
description: ($A62B)Transfer value from temp buf to window line buffer. | Zero out description index.

name: WindowXOverRun
label: WindowXOverRun
description: The X coordinate in pixels is now calculated. | Did X position go past nametable boundary? If not, branch. | Window tile ran beyond end of nametable.

name: WindowYOverRun
label: WindowYOverRun
description: contains Y coordinate in tiles. | Did Y position go below nametable boundary? | If not, branch.

name: WizSprts
label: WizSprts
description: Wizard and warlock staff sprites.

name: WndDesc2ndHalf
label: WndDesc2ndHalf
description: If so, branch to get number of herbs in player's inventory. | Is the current description byte for keys? | If so, branch.

name: WndDownCont1
label: WndDownCont1
description: Is thos the last row of the message speed window? | If so, branch to exit. Cannot go down anymore. | Get window height.

name: WndDownCont2
label: WndDownCont2
description: If not, branch to continue processing. | ($AB3F)Move cursor to next position if next row is bottom. | Is the cursor Y cord at the top?

name: WndDownCont3
label: WndDownCont3
description: Set cursor Y coord to the Y home position. | Is cursor Y position at 0? | If not, branch.

name: WndLwr4Saved
label: WndLwr4Saved
description: Have 4 characters been loaded? | If not, branch to get next character. | ($A62B)Transfer value from temp buf to window line buffer.

name: WndProcessCharEnd1
label: WndProcessCharEnd1
description: ($AEBC)Remove underscore character from screen. | Move underscore back 1 character. | ($AEB8)Show underscore below selected letter in name window.

name: WndProcessCharEnd2
label: WndProcessCharEnd2
description: Have 8 character been entered for player's name? | If so, branch to end. | ($AEB8)Show underscore below selected letter in name window.

name: WndRightCont1
label: WndRightCont1
description: Move cursor to point to END. | Prepare new cursor X position. | Is cursor in right most column?

name: WndSpell1Down
label: WndSpell1Down
description: ($AB35)Update cursor position on screen. | Down button press processed. Return. | Is this the last row(not used)?

name: WndSpell1Left
label: WndSpell1Left
description: ($AB35)Update cursor position on screen. | Left button press processed. Return. | Is this the 4th row in the SPELL1 window?

name: WndSpell1Right
label: WndSpell1Right
description: ($AB35)Update cursor position on screen. | Right button press processed. Return. | Is this the 2nd row in the SPELL1 window?

name: WndSpell1Up
label: WndSpell1Up
description: ($AB35)Update cursor position on screen. | Up button press processed. Return. | Move cursor tile position to 3,2.

name: WndSymbConvert1
label: WndSymbConvert1
description: Subtract value to convert to nametable character. | Use table to convert to nametable character.

name: WndSymbConvert2
label: WndSymbConvert2
description: Use table to convert to nametable character. | Use table to convert to nametable character.

name: WordBufBreakFound
label: WordBufBreakFound
description: Increment window position pointer. | ($B8F9)Check for non-word character. | Still in word? If so, branch.

name: WordToScreen
label: WordToScreen
description: End coordinate calculations. | Zero out word buffer index.

name: WorkBufDone
label: WorkBufDone
description: Are work buffer bytes waiting to be returned? | If not, branch to retreive a ROM byte instead. | Grab the next byte from the work buffer.

name: WorkBufEndChar
label: WorkBufEndChar
description: ($B6DA)Convert word in $00/$01 to BCD. | Place termination character at end of work buffer.

name: WorkBufShift
label: WorkBufShift
description: Insert 'n' into work buffer. | Insert space into work buffer after 'n'. | Prepare to shift 39 bytes.

name: WorkTileNotBlank
label: WorkTileNotBlank
description: Store current byte in working tile variable. | Indicate character byte being processed.

name: WpnArmrConv
label: WpnArmrConv
description: Return dragon's scale description byte. | Get proper description byte for weapon, armor and shield.

name: WyvernWngSFX
label: WyvernWngSFX
description: Noise timer period = 254, 4 counts. | End SFX. | len counter yes, env yes, vol=1.

name: XferTempToWork
label: XferTempToWork
description: Save length of description buffer. | Zero index. | Is there data to transfer?

name: YesNo1Dat
label: YesNo1Dat
description: Display items in window. | Finish variable length window. | Window Options.  Selection window.

name: YesNo2Dat
label: YesNo2Dat
description: Blank tiles, remainder of row. | Window Options.  Selection window.

name: _BinWordToBCD
label: _BinWordToBCD
description: ($A622)To binary to BCD conversion. | ($A62B)Transfer value from temp buf to window line buffer. | ($A741)Load binary word to convert to BCD.

name: _ClearDialogOutBuf
label: _ClearDialogOutBuf
description: Increment to next byte. | Have all the bytes been moved up? | If not, branch to get next dialog byte.

name: _WndDoSelectLoop
label: _WndDoSelectLoop
description: Disable right button retrigger. | Initialize joypad presses to a known value. | ($A8E4)Loop while selection window is active.

name: AddBlocksToScreen
label: AddBlocksToScreen
description: ($A194)ShowWindow, bank 1. | Will always be 0.

name: AddInvItem
label: AddInvItem
description: Branch always to tell player they are cursed. | Store a copy of the inventory item and zero out index.

name: AddInvLoop
label: AddInvLoop
description: Store a copy of the inventory item and zero out index. | Is the lower nibble inventory slot already occupied?

name: AddItemBonuses
label: AddItemBonuses
description: Penalize max HP. | ($F10C)Multiply stat by 9/10. | Get equipped items.

name: AddPPUBufferEntry
label: AddPPUBufferEntry
description: Move to next palette byte. | Is the PPU buffer full?

name: AddPalByte
label: AddPalByte
description: ($C661)Add a byte of palette data to the PPU buffer. | Have all the palettes been processed? | If not, branch to add color data to another palette.

name: AlreadyWearingRing
label: AlreadyWearingRing

name: ApplyPurchase
label: ApplyPurchase
description: Set players gold to max value of 65535. | /2. Restore index to original value.

name: ApplyShield
label: ApplyShield
description: Equip new armor. | Branch always to complete process. | Subtract 13 to move shield to proper bit

name: AttributeLoop
label: AttributeLoop

name: BGGFXLoadLoop
label: BGGFXLoadLoop
description: Buffer combat background graphics in | RAM starting at $050A. | Keeps track of current location in row.

name: BGGFXScreenLoop
label: BGGFXScreenLoop

name: BGLoadRow
label: BGLoadRow
description: Keeps track of current location in row. | Is the combat happening on the overworld?

name: BWScreenFlash
label: BWScreenFlash
description: ($DA55)Print text indicating spell did not work. | Prepare to flash screen 8 times.

name: Bank0ToNT0
label: Bank0ToNT0
description: ($FFAC)load nametable 0 with CHR ROM bank 1. | Restore A before returning. | Save A on stack.

name: Bank0ToNT1
label: Bank0ToNT1
description: Save A on stack. | Indicate CHR ROM bank 0 to be loaded. | Load it into nametable 0.

name: Bank1ToNT0
label: Bank1ToNT0
description: Restore A. | Save A on stack.

name: Bank2ToNT1
label: Bank2ToNT1
description: Indicate CHR ROM bank 0 to be loaded. | Load it into nametable 1. | Indicate CHR ROM bank 2 to be loaded.

name: Bank3ToNT1
label: Bank3ToNT1
description: ($FFC2)load nametable 1. | Restore A and return. | Indicate CHR ROM bank 3 to be loaded.

name: BattleBlock
label: BattleBlock
description: Clear bottom row of block.

name: BlankBlock
label: BlankBlock
description: Branch always. | This portion of code should never run under normal circumstances. | Remove no tiles from the current block.

name: Block2TileConv
label: Block2TileConv
description: Indicate data is being saved to RAM buffer. | Set MSB to determine target later. | Branch always.

name: BlockStopSpell
label: BlockStopSpell
description: TextBlock16, entry 14. Spell is blocked... | ($C7BD) | ($E5CE)It's the player's turn to attack.

name: BodyCursedDialog
label: BodyCursedDialog
description: If not, branch to check if its the death necklace. | Is the player wearing the cursed belt? | If so, branch to check if player is discarding death necklace.

name: BridgeAnimDone
label: BridgeAnimDone
description: Move to the next colors in the palette. | Branch always. | Wait for the music clip to end.

name: BuildBridgeLoop1
label: BuildBridgeLoop1
description: Load the initial color for rainbow flash. | ($FF74)Wait for VBlank interrupt.

name: BuildBridgeLoop2
label: BuildBridgeLoop2
description: Prepare to cycle the rainbow flash colors 4 times. | Load the initial color for rainbow flash.

name: BuyKey
label: BuyKey
description: ($C7CB)Thou hast not enough money. | TextBlock2, entry 3. | ($D804)End key shop dialog.

name: ByteDivide
label: ByteDivide
description: Done multiplying. | Set upper byte of dividend to 0

name: CRCCheckFail
label: CRCCheckFail
description: Indicate saved game data successfully copied. | ($FB0C)Done making copies of the saved game. | Increment CRC fail counter.

name: CalcAttribAddr
label: CalcAttribAddr
description: Not used. | Drop lower 2 bytes and multiply by 2.

name: CalcNextMap
label: CalcNextMap
description: Indicate player came down stairs. Always faces right. | Branch always. | Indicate player new facing direction is table lookup.

name: CalcNextOdds
label: CalcNextOdds
description: ($C55B)Get random number. | Keep only lower 6 bits(0-63). | Store random number as a multiplier.

name: CalcPPUBufAddr
label: CalcPPUBufAddr

name: CalcPlyrDmg
label: CalcPlyrDmg

name: CalcPlyrGold
label: CalcPlyrGold
description: Max out player's experience. | Prepare to multiply enemy's base gold by a random number.

name: CalcRAMBufAddr
label: CalcRAMBufAddr
description: Indicate data is being saved to PPU address buffer. | Set bit 6 to determine target later. | Branch always.

label: CalcSelectedSlot

name: CalcSlotExit
label: CalcSlotExit

label: CalcWhoIsNext
description: ($C55B)Get random number.

name: ChangeMaps
label: ChangeMaps

name: CheckJoyRight

name: MapEntryTbl

The first byte is the current map number. | The next two bytes are the x and y positions respectively on the current map that connect to the | target map.  The coordinates are based on the upper left corner of the map and start at 0,0.

name: MapTargetTbl
label: MapTargetTbl
description: This table is the same size as the table above and each entry is the destination from the exits | above. Entry 1 in the table above corresponds to entry 1 in the table below. Stairs up use this | table for the current map and use the table above for the destination.
